UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location -Path 'mariadb/mariadb'; if (& bin/mariadb-admin.exe --port={{$ServerPort}} --user=root ping *> $null 2>&1) { exit 0 } else { & bin/mariadbd.exe --defaults-file=../.my.cnf --port={{$ServerPort}} --console}"

-c "cd mariadb/mariadb && timeout=60; while ((timeout--)); do bin/mariadb-admin --socket=../run/mariadbd/mariadbd.sock ping >/dev/null 2>&1 && break || sleep 1; done; ((timeout<0)) && exit 1; bin/mariadb-upgrade --port={{$ServerPort}} --socket=../run/mariadbd/mariadbd.sock --user=amp"

-NoProfile -Command "Set-Location -Path 'mariadb/mariadb'; for ($i=0; $i -lt 60; $i++) { & bin/mariadb-admin.exe --port={{$ServerPort}} --user=root ping *> $null 2>&1; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { break }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1 }; if ($i -eq 60) { exit 1 } else { & bin/mariadb.exe -u root --port={{$ServerPort}} -e \"CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'amp'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY ''; GRANT ALL ON *.* TO 'amp'@'localhost' WITH GRANT OPTION; FLUSH PRIVILEGES; exit\"; & bin/mariadb-upgrade.exe --port={{$ServerPort}} --user=amp }"
